profile.headline: Computer Science Engineering Student | Full Stack Developer
profile.bio: Computer Science Engineering student with hands-on experience in building full-stack web applications using MERN and Next.js. Strong foundation in backend systems, authentication, databases, and modern frontend frameworks. Passionate about scalable systems, problem-solving, and building real-world products.

education.institution: VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering and Technology
VMR Pradeep Kumar Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.title: Payment Wallet System (Paytm Clone)
projects.description: A peer-to-peer digital wallet system enabling secure money transfers between users.

projects.title: Eventify – Event Discovery & Ticketing Platform
projects.description: A full-fledged event discovery and ticketing platform with admin controls and QR-based ticket verification.
features: QR code ticket generation and verification
Gift ticket transfers and redeem codes

projects.title: NextStep – AI-Powered Career Guidance Platform
projects.description: An AI-based career guidance web application providing personalized career recommendations.
features: Multilingual AI chat assistant (English, Hindi, Telugu)
Course and college explorer with filters

projects.title: Fake News Detection System
projects.description: A machine learning system to classify news articles as real or fake using NLP techniques.
features: Text preprocessing with tokenization and stop-word removal

achievements: Ranked 9th out of 7300 teams in TuteDude Hackathon
